Package com.minesweeper.controller

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.minesweeper.controller.GameController
  • public class GameController
extends Object
    Controls the flow of the Minesweeper game, handling user interactions and game state updates.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GameController​(GameMode gameMode)
      Initializes a new GameController with the specified game mode.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameController

        public GameController​(GameMode gameMode)
        Initializes a new GameController with the specified game mode.
        Parameters:
        gameMode - The difficulty level of the game.

    • Method Detail

      • getGameMode

        public GameMode getGameMode()
        Returns the current game mode.
        Returns:
        the current game mode.

      • getRows

        public int getRows()
        Returns the number of rows in the game grid.
        Returns:
        the number of rows.

      • getColumns

        public int getColumns()
        Returns the number of columns in the game grid.
        Returns:
        the number of columns.

      • handleRightClick

        public void handleRightClick​(CellButton cellButton)
        Handles a right click on the specified cell button. If the cell is not revealed, it flags the cell. If the cell is already flagged, it unflags the cell. If the cell is revealed, it does nothing. Decrements the flags remaining count if a cell is flagged, and updates the flags remaining display.
        Parameters:
        cellButton - The cell button that was right-clicked.

      • handleLeftClick

        public void handleLeftClick​(CellButton cellButton)
        Handles a left click on the specified cell button. If the cell is flagged, it does nothing. Otherwise, it reveals the cell and updates the game state. If the game is over, it displays a game over message and closes the game frame.
        Parameters:
        cellButton - The cell button that was left-clicked.

      • flagCell

        public void flagCell​(CellButton cellButton)
        Flags the specified cell button if it is not flagged, and unflags it if it is flagged. Decrements the flags remaining count if a cell is flagged, and updates the flags remaining display.
        Parameters:
        cellButton - The cell button to flag/unflag.

      • getFlagsRemaining

        public int getFlagsRemaining()
        Returns the number of flags remaining.
        Returns:
        the number of flags remaining.

      • startNewGame

        public void startNewGame​(GameMode gameMode)
        Starts a new game with the specified game mode.
        Parameters:
        gameMode - The difficulty level of the new game.

      • solveGame

        public void solveGame()
        Solves the game using an automated player. The player will make moves until the game is either won or lost.

      • revealAllCells

        public void revealAllCells()
        Reveals all cells in the game grid, showing mines and counts. If a cell contains a mine, it will be revealed as a mine. Otherwise, the cell will display the number of adjacent mines.
